## MatchMediaBehavior.unbind() method

Unbinds the behavior from the element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unbind(source: typeof FASTElement & HTMLElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | typeof [FASTElement](./fast-element.fastelement.md) &amp; HTMLElement | The element for which the behavior is unbinding. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
